rationale: Figure 2, describing a 'full mediator model,' is the most likely to represent a causal model. The abstract explicitly mentions using 'Structural Equation Modeling (SEM) to test an emotion regulation model of self-compassion and stress,' and finding 'the mediating role of emotion regulation difficulties in the self-compassion-stress relationship.' This directly aligns with the concept of a causal model depicting pathways and mechanisms.
